title: Patch Notes
content: to the dialogue history in the Journal for the keyboard and mouse UI. (The controller UI already has this.) Fixed the border animation for pop-up notifications (like the 'Used Thieves' Tools' notification) being slightly offset from the border behind it. Fixed some terms not being properly displayed in some languages when browsing dialogue history in the Journal. The number that indicates how many camp supplies you have now updates correctly. Fixed the Common and Reactions tabs of the Character
